name: Solar Sentinel (UnifiedCode)
description:
In this game, you are the protector of a solar system filled with planets and asteroids. Your mission is to defend the planets from the incoming asteroids, which can destroy them and cause you to lose the game. To defend the planets, you must use your mouse to deflect the asteroids and prevent them from colliding with the planets.

The game is fast-paced and challenging, as the asteroids come at you from different angles and at increasing speeds. You must react quickly and strategically to defend the planets and keep them safe from harm. As you progress through the game, the difficulty level will increase, and you will face even more asteroids and challenges.

Remember, your ultimate goal is to keep all of the planets alive. If all the planets are destroyed, you will lose the game. So stay vigilant, stay focused, and do everything in your power to protect the solar system and emerge victorious!
